form . replaceChildren ( ) ; children . forEach ( ( child _ ) = > { / / Alter the children to simulate fields replacement const newChild = child . cloneNode ( true ) ; newChild . id = newChild . id + " - after - form - change " ; newChild . value = " " form . append ( newChild ) ; } ) ; / / Now remove a single field and add a replacement to the end of the form . const email = document . getElementById ( " email - node - addition - after - form - change " ) ;
